original_text: But when I speak to you, I will open your mouth and you shall say to them, ‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says.’ Whoever will listen let them listen, and whoever will refuse let them refuse; for they are a rebellious people.
korean_text: 그러나 내가 너와 말할 때에 네 입을 열리니 너는 그들에게 이르기를 주 여호와의 말씀이 이러하시다 하라 들을 자는 들을 것이요 듣기 싫은 자는 듣지 아니하리니 그들은 반역하는 족속임이니라

sentences.original_text: But when I speak to you
and you shall say to them
'This is what the Sovereign Lord says.'
Whoever will listen let them listen
and whoever will refuse let them refuse
for they are a rebellious people
